common.name: Name
common.karakibIsEcoFriendlyPlatform: Karakib is an eco-friendly platform that rewards recycling and supports a sustainable future. Join our mission to keep Egypt clean and green.
common.workingTogetherForCleanerFuture: Working Together for a Cleaner Future
common.karakibSimplifiesRecyclingProcess: Karakib simplifies the recycling process by allowing users to collect, schedule pickups, and earn points effortlessly. We believe sustainability should be accessible and rewarding for everyone.
common.aboutUsDescription: Karakib is an eco-friendly platform that inspires people to make recycling a part of their everyday life. We believe that small actions can create big change ‚Äî and that by working together, we can build a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable Egypt. Through Karakib, users can easily recycle different types of waste, from plastics and paper to clothes and electronics, all while earning rewards that make sustainability both meaningful and fun. Our goal is not just to collect waste, but to spread awareness about the importance of recycling and reducing pollution across communities. We‚Äôre here to prove that every item we recycle can have a new purpose and every person can make a difference. By joining Karakib, you become part of a growing movement that values responsibility, innovation, and care for our planet. Let‚Äôs turn waste into opportunity ‚Äî and together, shape a brighter and cleaner future for everyone.
common.recyclingPopup: At Karakib, we believe recycling should be simple, enjoyable, and rewarding. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve made it easier than ever for users to sort their waste, schedule collections, and earn points they can redeem for exciting rewards. By turning sustainability into a fun and engaging experience, we aim to inspire more people to take part in protecting our planet. Through our platform, users can track their recycling progress, learn about eco-friendly habits, and discover creative ways to reuse everyday materials. We‚Äôre not just collecting waste ‚Äî we‚Äôre creating a movement that encourages individuals and communities to think differently about what they throw away. Whether it‚Äôs plastic, paper, metal, or clothes ‚Äî every item recycled through Karakib brings us one step closer to a cleaner, greener, and more sustainable Egypt. Together, we can make recycling a way of life and turn small actions into big positive change.
common.supportingGreenerCommunityDescription: At Karakib, we believe that true change begins with community. Our goal is to build a powerful network of individuals, families, schools, and organizations who work hand in hand to protect the environment and create a cleaner, greener Egypt. We partner with NGOs, local businesses, and recycling initiatives to promote eco-friendly habits and make sustainability part of everyday life. Through awareness campaigns, recycling drives, and reward-based programs, Karakib empowers people to turn small actions into lasting impact. Recycling isn‚Äôt just a one-time effort ‚Äî it‚Äôs a lifestyle. Together, we can inspire a new generation that values sustainability, reduces waste, and contributes to a future where Egypt shines as a model of environmental responsibility.
common.innovationWithPurposeDescription: At Karakib, innovation is more than just using technology ‚Äî it‚Äôs about using it for good. We believe that technology has the power to reshape how people think about recycling and sustainability. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôre dedicated to developing smart, user-friendly solutions that make recycling more accessible, efficient, and rewarding for everyone. Through continuous research and improvement, we aim to create a digital platform that not only simplifies waste collection but also inspires eco-conscious behavior. From AI-powered waste detection to real-time tracking of recycling activities, Karakib integrates modern tools that help users understand their environmental impact and make greener choices every day. Our purpose-driven innovation connects people, data, and sustainability ‚Äî turning technology into a force for positive change. Together, we‚Äôre building a future where smart living and environmental care go hand in hand for a cleaner, brighter Egypt.
common.ourGoalIsToBuildNetwork: Our goal is to build a network of individuals and organizations working together toward a greener, more sustainable Egypt. Recycling isn't just a habit ‚Äî it's a lifestyle.
common.karakibCombinesTechnologyAndEnvironmenta: Karakib combines technology and environmental care to make recycling smarter. We continuously improve our platform to create a positive impact for both users and the planet.

common.karakibWillNotBeHeldResponsible: Karakib will not be held responsible for losses or damages that occur as a result of improper waste handling before our team reviews or collects it.
common.anyMisuseOfPlatform: Any misuse of the platform, including providing false information, will result in immediate suspension of the user's account.
common.weMayUpdateTheseTerms: We may update these terms at any time. You are responsible for reviewing them periodically.
common.usersMustProvideAccurateInformation: Users must provide accurate and up-to-date personal information when creating an account or submitting waste for recycling.
common.karakibReservesRightToModify: Karakib reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the service at any time without prior notice.
common.allTransactionsThroughPlatform: All transactions through the platform must be conducted in accordance with local laws and regulations regarding waste management.
common.usersAreProhibitedFromSharing: Users are prohibited from sharing their account credentials with others or using the platform for any illegal or fraudulent activities.
common.privacyPolicyGovernsCollection: By using Karakib, you agree to our data collection and use as outlined in our Privacy Policy.
common.weAreHappyToAnswerQuestions: We're happy to answer any questions or partnership requests.
